sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Public Self-Care of Diabetes Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Public Self-Care of Diabetes Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. The General Assembly finds that insulin injection is necessary for diabetics and their continued health and longevity
sections.text: The General Assembly finds that forcing diabetics to administer their personal insulin injections out of public view is unnecessarily restrictive.

sections.heading: Public self-care of diabetes location
sections.text: A person with diabetes, or parent or legal guardian of a person with diabetes, may self-administer insulin or administer insulin for his or her child in any location, public or private, where the person, or the person's parent or legal guardian, is authorized t

sections.heading: Illegal drugs.   Nothing in this Act shall be construed to authorize the use of any illegal drug.
sections.text: Illegal drugs. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to authorize the use of any illegal drug.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
